subject: RE: Updates to Metro Rehab Website
preview: Hi Trudy,  We use an online tool called https://smartmockups.com/ - it saves a load of time and means our non-design team members can get a quality result as well.

full_threads.body:
Hi Trudy,  

We use an online tool called https://smartmockups.com/ - it saves a load of time and means our non-design team members can get a quality result as well.

Look great, thanks very much.

Would it be possible to have a video on how to create those 3D brochures?

Kind regards,

Trudy.

TRUDY MCENEARNEY​

MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER

235 Morrison Road

Ryde

NSW

2112

D.

+61 2 9808 9356

M.

0410 346 164

E.

Trudy.McEnearney@royalrehab.com.au









I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Trudy, 

Confirming we have now setup the PDF brochure links on these pages:

  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/neurological-rehabilitation-program/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/sydney-stroke-rehabilitation-centre/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/cancer-rehabilitation-programs/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/parkinsons-disease/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/day-programs/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/orthopaedic-musculoskeletal-rehabilitation/
  • https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/information-for-patients/am-i-covered/

Please let us know if you would like this applied to any other pages.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
@jaime @glen 

Looks good, thank you! We just need the image to stack on top of the buttons in Mobile view though please. And then we can apply to all of the pages in that section with a 'download brochure' option. Please ensure the image is still clickable to download the brochure as well.

@heath done updating brochure section both desktop and mobile base on the attached image
https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/neurological-rehabilitation-program/

please check thanks
@glen thanks for this. Can you please style like the attached. @jaime can help if you need a hand. Jaime it's ok to pause on Huntley to get this one done. Cheers
@heath can you check this, https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/neurological-rehabilitation-program/ thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
On these pages, there is a PDF available for download. Can we please make some nice thumbnail images of them:

Here is a how to video:
https://www.loom.com/share/5149920595d04e32a1430a0d26079138

And to login to Smartmockups:

https://smartmockups.com/
User: heath@wolfiq.com.au
Pass: Wpperk007!

Thanks!

Hi Heath and Brittany,

Thanks for this work. That’s better on the Home page. Thumb nail of the brochure would be good as long as it is towards the bottom of the page. We are finding most users are downloading the PDFs rather than taking other actions.

Kind regards,

Trudy.

Hi Brittany,

Confirming we have made the updates on the home page.

Regarding your question re the CTA, we can create little thumbnails of the brochures, similar to what we have on this page: https://royalrehab.com.au/eksonr/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/eksonr/> (they would be larger).

Does that work for you? It will help it to visually standout.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

On 19 Apr 2021, at 12:12 pm, Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>> wrote:

Hey Heath,

Just wanted to touch base regarding some further updates to the Metro Rehab website.

HOMEPAGE IMAGE UPDATES & CONTENT:
I was wondering if we are able to update the homepage images in the row and content to instead be:

<image.png>


<stroke-rehabilitation-and-management-in-Sydney.jpg>
NEUROLOGICAL PROGRAM:
We have a specialised neurological program <https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/day-programs/> to facilitate the recovery of patients with neurological injury or illness.
Linking to: https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/neurological-rehabilitation-program/ <https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/neurological-rehabilitation-program/>

DAY PROGRAM:
<Rehabilitation-Hospital-Sydney.jpg>
At MetroRehab we have a variety of day rehabilitation programs for patients who are well enough and independent enough to come in from home for ongoing treatments.
Linking to: https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/day-programs/ <https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/day-programs/>

INPATIENT PROGRAM:
<Cancer-Rehab-Sydney.jpg>
At MetroRehab Hospital we bring together skilled people, the very latest in technology and innovative therapies to deliver you the best results in our inpatient rehabilitation programs.
Linking to: https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/inpatient-rehabilitation-programs/ <https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/inpatient-rehabilitation-programs/>

STRONGER BROCHURE CTA:
Currently on each of the patient programs there is a button download for each of the program brochures:

<image.png>

Did you have any stronger suggestions for a more noticeable/eye catching CTA?

Any questions please let me know,

Thanks
Brittany
